mapper.select: select exists(select 1 from tb_role_modular where roleIndex = ${roleIndex} and modularIndex = ${modularIndex} and organizationIndex = ${organizationIndex})
mapper.insert: insert into tb_role_modular(roleIndex, modularIndex, organizationIndex) values(${roleIndex}, ${modularIndex}, ${organizationIndex})
mapper.delete: delete from tb_role_modular where roleIndex = ${roleIndex} and modularIndex = ${modularIndex} and organizationIndex = ${organizationIndex}
